title: Teachware-based Language Education for Self-directed Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic job-related language proficiency and intermediate-level work experience
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen language competencies immediately applicable in practical settings, operating in smartphone-centric limited technology environments

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% proficiency in communication using specialized terminology in a work simulation environment.
Learners set and evaluate self-directed learning goals at least twice a month using teachware.
Learners perform customer consultation scenarios with over 70% accuracy through VR-based role-play assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
